title: Drawing, "Textile Design: Oval-shaped arrangement of small flowers", 20th century
medium: Brush and orange-red and black gouache on white paper.
description: Orange-red flowers with black centers and black leaves on large grid, oval-shaped design.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Textile Design: Oval-shaped arrangement of small flowers", 20th century.
20th century. Brush and orange-red and black gouache on white paper.. Gift of Max Wilner. 1942-87-1-b.
